verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H3947>Take<s%> thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1549>roll,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> it with a <S%H582>man's<s%> <S%H2747>pen<s%> concerning <S%H4122>Maher-shalal-hash-baz.<s%>

And I took unto me <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> to <S%H5749>record,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3000>Jeberechiah.<s%>

And I <S%H7126>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess;<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H7121>Call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4122>Maher-shalal-hash-baz.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall have <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> to <S%H7121>cry,<s%> My <S%H1>father,<s%> and my <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be taken <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> also <S%H413>unto<s%> me <S%H3254>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3988>refuseth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H7975>Shiloah<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H328>softly,<s%> and rejoice <S%H4885>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> and <S%H7425>Remaliah's<s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%>

Now <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> bringeth <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H5104>river,<s%> <S%H6099>strong<s%> and <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3519>glory:<s%> and he shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H650>channels,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his banks: <S%H1415><s%>

And he shall <S%H2498>pass<s%> through <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> he shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and go <S%H5674>over,<s%> he shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H6677>neck;<s%> and the stretching <S%H4298>out<s%> of his <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall <S%H4393>fill<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of thy <S%H776>land,<s%> O <S%H6005>Immanuel.<s%>

Associate <S%H7489><s%> yourselves, O ye <S%H5971>people,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H2844>broken<s%> in pieces; and give <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye of <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>countries:<s%> gird <S%H247>yourselves,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H2844>broken<s%> in pieces; gird <S%H247>yourselves,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H2844>broken<s%> in pieces.

Take counsel <S%H5779>together<s%> <S%H6098><s%> and it shall come to <S%H6565>naught;<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> and it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>stand:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is with <S%H5973>us.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me with a <S%H2393>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3256>instructed<s%> me that I should not <S%H4480>walk<s%> <S%H1980><s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> ye <S%H3808>not,<s%> A <S%H7195>confederacy,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> them to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> A <S%H7195>confederacy;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye their <S%H4172>fear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H6206>afraid.<s%>
Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> himself; and let <S%H1931>him<s%> be your <S%H4172>fear,<s%> and let <S%H1931>him<s%> be your <S%H6206>dread.<s%>

And he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> but for a <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H5063>stumbling<s%> and for a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4383>offense<s%> to <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for a <S%H6341>gin<s%> and for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%H7227>many<s%> among them shall <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and be <S%H3369>snared,<s%> and be <S%H3920>taken.<s%>
Bind <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H8584>testimony,<s%> <S%H2856>seal<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> among my <S%H3928>disciples.<s%>

And I will <S%H2442>wait<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H5641>hideth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and I will <S%H6960>look<s%> for him.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> and the <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me are for <S%H226>signs<s%> and for <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> they shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3049>wizards<s%> that <S%H6850>peep,<s%> and that <S%H1897>mutter:<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H430>God?<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4191>dead?<s%>

To the <S%H8451>law<s%> and to the <S%H8584>testimony:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> it is <S%H834>because<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7837>light<s%> in them.

And they shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it, hard <S%H7185>pressed<s%> and <S%H745>hungry:<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H3588>when<s%> they shall be <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> they shall fret <S%H7107>themselves,<s%> and <S%H7043>curse<s%> their <S%H4428>king<s%> and their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

And they shall <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H2825>darkness,<s%> <S%H4588>dimness<s%> of <S%H6695>anguish;<s%> and they shall be <S%H5080>driven<s%> to <S%H653>darkness.<s%>
